short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Let Open AI filter the content for you, based on YOUR OWN preference.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension utilizes an OpenAI GPT model as its backend to assist users in filtering content according to their preferences.

Major social media platforms, like Twitter, employ recommendation systems to generate personalized home feeds for their users. Although these systems have achieved some success in tailoring content, users often desire a greater degree of control over their viewing experience.

By leveraging this extension, users can input their preferences in textual form, allowing the underlying OpenAI model to determine the relevance of the content displayed in their home feed. In cases where the content is deemed unrelated to the users' preferences, the extension aids in its removal.

This development is inspired by RecAlign.
